welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ramara, Canada! Get ready to experience the small-town charm and natural beauty this city is known for. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Ramara has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lake Simcoe Regional Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including shops, restaurants, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lake Simcoe Regional Airport caters to private and corporate flights, offering exclusive services and amenities for a luxurious travel experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Muskoka Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Muskoka Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
